Subject: Problems building from 10.0-src tarball with Maven 1.0-rc2
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=6903103
X-Yahoo-Profile: tree02139

Hi all,

I am unable to build from the 10.0-src tarball under Maven 1.0-rc2,
using either the 'dist' or 'jar' goal (I usually use 'jar' since I
haven't bothered to install the doc generation plugins since I never
intend to generate the doc). Things proceed OK, until the unit
tests. It then stops after the unit tests and doesn't build the jar.

Has anyone else seen failures in DiskBackedDequeTest and
DiskStackTest?

[...]

[blah blah]
    [junit] Running org.archive.util.DiskBackedDequeTest
    [junit] Tests run: 7, Failures: 2, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 0.45 sec

[blah blah]

[blah blah]
